rules_text:
When this creature transforms, put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
Menace, deathtouch
[i]Yasha Apotrope[/i] – Saber has protection from all card types among cards in graveyards. Other permanents you control have hexproof.
[i]Tri-affliction – [/i]Whenever Saber deals combat damage, target opponent loses 4 life, mills three cards, and discards two cards.
